body: elias @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/posting.php?mode=reply&f=82&t=7121#pr127050 more customize-able sound effect possibilities, such as having distinct sound effects when loosing life, being poisoned, drawing a new card, start of players turn, start of computers turn, casting a creature, casting a sorcery, casting an instant, starting a new duel, adding a land, taking a mulligan, win the duel, lost the game, won the game, etc.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: More sound effects
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on July 28, 2013 09:35:31_

elias @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/posting.php?mode=reply&f=82&t=7121#pr127050 more customize-able sound effect possibilities, such as having distinct sound effects when loosing life, being poisoned, drawing a new card, start of players turn, start of computers turn, casting a creature, casting a sorcery, casting an instant, starting a new duel, adding a land, taking a mulligan, win the duel, lost the game, won the game, etc.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=375_
